meanings.sent1: The store had a strict policy on unreturnable items.
meanings.sent2: The unreturnable book had a final sale sticker on it.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought an unreturnable gift, so I had to get creative with it.
meanings.sent4: Her decision was unreturnable, like a sealed envelope.
meanings.sent5: The unreturnable truth finally sank in.

meanings.sent1: The borrowed tool was unreturnable because it broke.
meanings.sent2: The unreturnable favor she did for me was greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his memory was unreturnable, like a borrowed pen.
meanings.sent4: The unreturnable time slipped away like sand through fingers.
meanings.sent5: The unreturnable kindness of strangers warmed her heart.

meanings.sent1: The unreturnable product left the customer dissatisfied.
meanings.sent2: The unreturnable service was clearly stated in the contract.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at humor was unreturnable, like a bad joke.
meanings.sent4: The unreturnable investment turned out to be a valuable lesson.
meanings.sent5: The unreturnable mistake cost him more than just money.
